name: EtherVesting
description: EtherVesting. An ether holder contract that can release its ether balance gradually like a typical vesting scheme, with a vesting period. Optionally revocable by the owner. NOTE: anyone can send ETH to the contract but only the owner or the beneficiary can receive ETH from this contract.

returnDecorators.description: the duration of the ether vesting.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

returnDecorators.description: the amount of the ether released.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

returnDecorators.description: true if the vesting is revocable.

functionDecorators.name: revoke
functionDecorators.description: Allows the owner to revoke the vesting. Ether already vested remain in the contract, the rest are returned to the owner.

returnDecorators.description: true if the ether is revoked.
the start time of the ether vesting.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
